news_title: Bitwise Debuts First Major ETF Including Avalanche, Sui, And Polkadot
news_subtitle: Bitwise launched its 10-crypto index ETF on NYSE with $1 billion in assets, offering broad digital currency exposure through a single fund

news_title: Polkadot DOT Wyckoff Signals $2 Bottom and Beyond
